txt.en: Discover the entrance to the Hiddenhoard of Abnankâra

Once an ancient treasury wrought in secret by Mótsog and the Greymauls during their rebellion against the Longbeards in the Elder Days, the Hiddenhoard of Abnankâra has become the lair of Hrímil Frost-heart, a dreaded cold-dragon of Morgoth.

Beyond the falls of Amgaruslun in the Clovengap lies the Hiddenhoard of Abnankâra: an ancient treasury wrought in secret by Mótsog and the Greymauls during their rebellion against the Longbeards in the Elder Days.
Beyond the falls of Amgaruslun in the Clovengap, you have discovered the Hiddenhoard of Abnankâra!
Discover the entrance to the Hiddenhoard of Abnankâra.
